title: HackersTrade
author: HackersTrade
content: Hi all. Many will not believe it, but I was able to unravel the MM algorithms on the binance exchange in ETH-USDT trading and based on this I created an MM action analyzer that helps to ideally find the entry point for short and long. The algorithm was tested at a distance of 6 months, if you do not violate the rules of trading and remove emotions, then you can take from 2-3 x per month on 10 leverage.My goal is to create a precedent in the crypto world and show how MM makes money by manipulating the market in the right direction long before the news background.Try it, share your thoughts, and trade with MM who never trades in the lost, which means that by following his actions we earn with him.https://t.me/+ZW5chvSV4cs3ZmU9

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: HackersTrade on April 29, 2023, 10:04:06 AMthen you can take from 2-3 x per month on 10 leverage.RED flag. 3x per month changes 1000$ into 500 000 000 in a matter of 1 year. After 2 years someone with such tool would have more money than there is in the world. I advise anyone against any interaction with the OP, because it can end badly.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: I would never pay X amount of money to make Y amount of money using a Z indicator. Because. They never work.The market cannot be predicted or priced by any indicator, all the indicator relies on price i.e. Open, High, Low, and Close of the candle of the chart.OHLC - Google it. You need to understand price action trading in order to master the market. No indicator will save you.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: You know that Market Makers are used to creating volume and not necessarily making profits, right? You can do this and cannot always make profits because of the possible fees you will get. You can only have assurance sometimes, then if you are put into the wrong position, you will lose money for that.Saying that you can profit consistently is a red flag. Careful.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: HackersTrade on April 29, 2023, 10:04:06 AMHi all. Many will not believe it,Because they are not certainly going to just believe any stranger on the internet, especially when they claim that they can make lots of money.Quote from: HackersTrade on April 29, 2023, 10:04:06 AMbut I was able to unravel the MM algorithms on the binance exchange in ETH-USDT trading and based on this I created an MM action analyzer that helps to ideally find the entry point for short and long. The algorithm was tested at a distance of 6 months, if you do not violate the rules of trading and remove emotions, then you can take from 2-3 x per month on 10 leverage.if your "Market Maker action analyzer" was making that much per month. I doubt you would even have time in the spaces trying to announce how you found a loophole in Binance's Market Maker algorithms.

comments.author: HackersTrade
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on April 30, 2023, 06:03:16 AMQuote from: HackersTrade on April 29, 2023, 10:04:06 AMthen you can take from 2-3 x per month on 10 leverage.RED flag. 3x per month changes 1000$ into 500 000 000 in a matter of 1 year. After 2 years someone with such tool would have more money than there is in the world. I advise anyone against any interaction with the OP, because it can end badly.haha   it's not so easy as you think if you didn't have any trading experience before you can make a lot of mistakes and more likely you will lose your deposit . that's why i wrote on the beginning about that very important not violate the rules of trading and remove emotions but all of us know that is not easy ,especially when the price of an asset is below the entry point for a long time.

comments.author: HackersTrade
comments.body: Quote from: crwth on April 30, 2023, 06:27:19 AMYou know that Market Makers are used to creating volume and not necessarily making profits, right? You can do this and cannot always make profits because of the possible fees you will get. You can only have assurance sometimes, then if you are put into the wrong position, you will lose money for that.Saying that you can profit consistently is a red flag. Careful.Market maker can dive the price by volumes and buying all dump but he will sell it higher anyway , based on my experience  he never trade for loses.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Regardless of how legit your service is, I'd stay away from a service that asks me to join a sketchy Telegram group before I can access them. There are many tools out there that can compete with yours, most of the time there is a free option that allows users to test them without giving unnecessary personal information. You should probably improve and offer other means to access your service if you really want to get customers and not just exit scam after you earn a hundred or a thousand deposit.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: HackersTrade on April 29, 2023, 10:04:06 AMHi all. Many will not believe it, but I was able to unravel the MM algorithms on the binance exchange in ETH-USDT trading and based on this I created an MM action analyzer that helps to ideally find the entry point for short and long. The algorithm was tested at a distance of 6 months, if you do not violate the rules of trading and remove emotions, then you can take from 2-3 x per month on 10 leverage.Disregarding the scammy profit return promise by the OP. Is it really possible to analyze the market maker behavior completely using an algorithm thingy? Afaik MM behaves based on the actual market condition and having a random price action will surely give an inaccurate data for the analysis since it will just still follow the random behavior of the market.Example if the analyzer provides a long position using the current behavior of the market then suddenly bad news happened. The price will surely go the opposite direction leaving the current long position prediction invalid.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: I think you didn't really use an attractive catchy in your post and that is why it is obvious to every one that you have something fishy up your sleeve.  MM usually manipulate the market by either creating fud and cause price change. They either buy or sell unimaginable to attract a position where is not expected.  Therefore, I just won't fall for such gimmick by a newbie .

If you are able to develop a trading system like this, you should focus on developing it and earning profits. You can either sell it or create private groups instead of sharing it for free on forums. Usually, free sharing does not attract many people.

comments.author: HackersTrade
comments.created_time: April 30, 2023, 04:30:47 PMLast edit: April 30, 2023, 07:57:23 PM by HackersTrade
comments.body: During the day from 30 to 01 five deals 3 take 2 by stop in inter point, total: + 40% per day.We trade further.

Usually, free sharing does not attract many people.I'm not looking for profit here, I'm doing well, I just want to show people and create a precedent for how a market maker works. It is very difficult for me to show the whole picture and communicate a lot with an English-speaking audience, so I can only give part of the information in an English-speaking group. Basic information and more deals and profit in my main Russian-speaking group. Sorry if I'm doing something wrong, but I just sincerely want to share this with everyone and show that the market maker knows in advance before the release of news and makes the right trade

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: HackersTrade on April 29, 2023, 10:04:06 AMThe algorithm was tested at a distance of 6 months, if you do not violate the rules of trading and remove emotions, then you can take from 2-3 x per month on 10 leverage.I have always described people who promise you that you will get a guaranteed profit using a certain method, as scammer.The market is difficult to trade, and everyone who gives you advice expresses his own analysis of the market and disclaims any responsibility or guarantee because you will get a profit, and he will not tell you that your profit is guaranteed.Why don't you use this method by yourself, the only reason you don't do it is if you're looking for fame, you use a forum that promotes privacy and you haven't published your personal photo or private data.
